title: Chasuble with orphrey cross: The Crucifixion
medium: velvet brocade | linen embroidered with silk | satin
description:
Chasuble: velvet brocade (cut and voided red silk velvet on gold thread ground), red satin lining
cross: linen embroidered with colored silk thread; some areas covered with cream, blue, or putty satin.
inscriptions: c. embroidered on top of cross: INRI; verso l.c. on white cotton tag: GB 639
